root.name: Last Flight
root.description: IntroductionLast Flight is a brawler using sharp culinary equipment. It is supposed to be released as episodic content.StoryYou are Larry Adelman, a 38-year-old culinary critic who also writes books about different cuisines around the world.When traveling to Europe by plane you are sitting next to the 30-year-old Anna from eastern Europe who is traveling to her home country to bury her father Jan, whose corpse is stored in the cargo bay of the plane. However, strong turbulence occurs and Anna's father's body fall out of the coffin revealing him to be a vampire, who starts attacking the passengers, inexplicably transforming them into zombies.
